amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that compliance with EPA rules should occur no later than 3 years after the rules have finalized.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to strike in the Compliance Dates section that "not earlier than 5 years after the effective date of the regulation" and insert "not later than 3 years after the regulation is promulated as final".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 262 (Roll no. 754).

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
